Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to removing police officer discipline from collective bargaining in municipalities in the state
Summary: Removes police officer discipline from collective bargaining in municipalities in the state.
LawCode: Add ยง204-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to removing police officer discipline from collective bargaining in the state
